DOC.criteria: Age least 35 year old Diagnostic finding prior mammography highly suggestive breast malignancy ( BI RADS® category 4 BIRADS® category 5 ) Not pregnant breastfeed Ability lie motionless 5 minute Recent breast biopsy History moderate severe reaction contrast agent injection History Allergy Iodine History multiple food and/or drug allergy Currently take Glucophage Glucovance ( Metformin ) History Chronic Asthma History Diabetes Mellitus Renal ( kidney ) disease , solitary kidney Recent lab test show elevated serum creatinine ( ≥ 1.5 mg/dL ) Recent lab test show estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) ≤ 60 ml/minute Positive urine pregnancy test currently breastfeed Inability understand risk benefit study The standard MRI contraindication apply , include limited : pacemaker implant electronic device , metal foreign body within eye , aneurysm clip , heart valve prosthesis , vascular stent , coil , intrauterine device ( IUDs ) , inferior vena cava ( IVC ) filter , gunshot wound retain bullet fragment .
